title: Jodi S. (Verified ZocDoc User)'s Review of Dr. Robert Hornberger - OD (5/5) on ZocDoc
text: Bedside Manner Wait Time I made my appointment on Zocdoc and got on the schedule within the next couple days. When I got to the office I was sitting over 2 hours and they where letting people go in front of me. I was told since I made my appointment on Zocsoc it didnt register somehow and that's where the confusion came from. Less than a year ago by a Verified Patient Bedside Manner Wait Time the doctor was being very professional and he was very friendly, but not the other workers. This is not a place where patients do not want to hear gossip about their relationship. AND to make matters worst these workers kept barging into the doctors room while he was examining my eyes talking about their drama and he had to politely kick them out. June 30, 2016
